title: The Training Grounds
overall_objective: Escape the locked training chamber by discovering the hidden key through careful observation and logical deduction

success_criteria.primary: Successfully unlock the door and escape the chamber

failure_conditions.death: Player dies from reckless actions and must restart
failure_conditions.timeout: Player becomes exhausted after too many failed attempts
failure_conditions.giving_up: Player chooses to abandon the challenge

story_beats.name: Trapped in the Chamber
story_beats.description: Player discovers they are locked in and must understand the challenge ahead
story_beats.objective: Realize the situation and begin systematic exploration
story_beats.success_criteria: Player acknowledges the locked door and begins exploring the chamber

story_beats.name: Systematic Investigation
story_beats.description: Player explores the chamber methodically, learning to observe details
story_beats.objective: Discover the clues that lead to the key's location
story_beats.success_criteria: Player finds at least one major clue (torch behavior or loose stone)

story_beats.name: Breakthrough and Resolution
story_beats.description: Player uses discovered clues to find the key and escape
story_beats.objective: Retrieve the hidden key and unlock the door
story_beats.success_criteria: Player successfully obtains the key and opens the door
